name: Planetory (VincentiusIV)
description:
Planetory is a simple factory builder game where your ultimate goal is to make planets! Combine the elements into different elements using a combination of different machines!

Controls:

  • Right Mouse Button to place an object.
  • R / Mouse Scroll Wheel to rotate objects.
  • 1-6 for selecting an object.

Made by Vincent Versnel, for the Wanna x Yam Game Jam 2022.

Credits

- 3D & UI art by Kenney
